roleset.name: write decoratively
roleset.note: CALLIGRAPHY-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in nouns-lv. Probably only works as eventive noun in LVC. Comparison to 'write'. (from calligraphy.01-n)

example.name: Arg 0 only, within LVC
example.text: " When I was little , my grandfather taught me *PRO* to read Chinese poems and do calligraphy .
